titleStmt.title: A medicinable morall, that is, the two bookes of Horace his satyres, Englyshed accordyng to the prescription of saint Hierome. The wailyngs of the prophet Hieremiah, done into Englyshe verse. Also epigrammes. T. Drant. Perused and allowed accordyng to the Quenes Maiesties iniunctions
Satirae. English
titleStmt.author: Horace.
Drant, Thomas, d. 1578?

notesStmt.note: The title page verso bears a dedication to Lady Bacon and Lady Cecil. Variant 1: this page blank. Variant 2: with two errata leaves.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
